text: logo! Allah ta’ala ne tumhe mitthi se, phir nutfe se paida kiya hai, phir tumhe jode jode (mardh wa aurath) bana diya hai, aurto ka haamela hona aur baccho ka tawalludh hona, sab us ke ilm se hee hai aur jo badi umr waala, umr diya jaaye aur jis kisi ki umar ghate, wo sab kitaab mein likha hoa hai, Allah ta’ala par ye baath bilkul asaan hai
